title: Curity Phantom Token Auth
description: Enables a custom code policy written in TypeScript. Change curity-phantom-token to the name of your module (without .ts extension)

export.description: The name of the exported type

options.description: Options to be passed to the custom policy

allowUnauthenticatedRequests.description: Allow unauthenticated requests to proceed. This is use useful if you want to use multiple authentication policies or if you want to allow both authenticated and non-authenticated traffic.
